title: Flipped Learning-Based Nursing Skill Performance Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling considering time constraints of working learners (administrative/managerial positions)

learning_goals: Learners master at least 90% of 20 core nursing skills over 12 weeks using online pre-learning materials.
Learners apply self-regulated learning strategies at over 80% proficiency through weekly reflective learning journals and peer feedback.
Learners enhance nursing skill performance by 30% compared to baseline through virtual simulations and video assessments.
Achieve a collaborative problem-solving ability of at least 3.5 points on a 4-level rubric during team-based project execution
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
